title: Broken Queue?
body:
Okay so, started a normal sr game right, everything went well in champ select, timer counts down to 0, game doesn't load for me or anyone else on the team, still able to chat with them and decide to restart client, now all i have is a reconnect button that does nothing and im assuming they do too. send help

So it appears in ~10 mins riot either sent the quickest help i've ever seen or the client fixed itself, but im assuming the latter.

replies.body: This sorta thing is expected to happen during network maintenance so rest assure you must be patient and wait for it to fix it self which normally takes around 5-10mins from my experience
